scripts.build: elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=codegen.fat.js; uglifyjs codegen.fat.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | uglifyjs --mangle --output=codegen.js; rm codegen.fat.js
scripts.test:
./index.js -f nope.json || ./index.js -f test-invalid.json || ./index.js -f test-malformed.json || ./index.js -f test-valid.json -r nope || ./index.js -f test-valid.json -r keywords || ./index.js -f test-valid.json -m nope || ./index.js -f test-valid.json -r navigation.admin -m I18n.Translations && echo '
[OK] Tests passed.'
